definition: set meal/product or service package (e.g. for a cell phone subscription)

to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)

sentences.english: Objective To observe the efficacy of Blattella germanica control with gel bait and poison powder.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察套餐法控制酒店德國小蠊的效果。

sentences.english: Choice of 2 courses lunch at RMB 88, including a cup of coffee or tea.
sentences.chinese: 午間特別套餐88元，包含一杯咖啡或茶任您選擇。

sentences.english: Tom:I'd like two chicken combos and an order of fried chicken wings.
sentences.chinese: 我要兩個雞腿漢堡套餐，外加一份炸雞翅。

sentences.english: McDonald's happy meal with Spiderman action figure.
sentences.chinese: 一份有蜘蛛俠電影情節的麥當勞快樂套餐。

sentences.english: In the schools' main cafeteria, cooks prepared two sets of free meals everyday.
sentences.chinese: 在學校的自助餐廳，廚師每天準備兩份免費套餐。

sentences.english: For strength training, change your routine every few weeks.
sentences.chinese: 對於力量訓練，每隔幾個禮拜就應換一個套餐。

sentences.english: I'd like a No. 5 meal please. Medium-sized.
sentences.chinese: 請給我一個五號中號的套餐。

sentences.english: Spicy Chicken Combo and two pineapple pies, please.
sentences.chinese: 一個麥辣雞腿套餐和兩個菠蘿派。

sentences.english: We recommend that you choose a set meal from the various dishes on this menu.
sentences.chinese: 我們建議您從菜單上的各種菜品中選一款套餐。

sentences.english: In contrast to previous moves, the new pledge will not include the caramel dip for fruit.
sentences.chinese: 此次的新推出的套餐裏，將不再推出沾焦糖的水果片。

sentences.english: Is Caesarian Section covered by the Obstetric Package service?
sentences.chinese: 產科套餐是否包括剖腹生產服務？

sentences.english: Set A has an apple pie and broiled lamb chops.
sentences.chinese: 套餐A有一個蘋果派和烤羊羔肉塊。

sentences.english: The Langham, Yangtze Boutique, Shanghai unveil the Royal Afternoon Tea.
sentences.chinese: 上海朗廷揚子精品酒店推出了朗廷皇室下午茶套餐。

sentences.english: Please refer to next page for package details & remarks.
sentences.chinese: 請參閱下頁之套餐詳情及備註。

sentences.english: I'd like to have a two-item combo to go, please.
sentences.chinese: 我想要外帶一個二道菜的套餐。

sentences.english: All promotion items can only be used during your actual stay-in period.
sentences.chinese: 所含套餐優惠僅限實際入住期間內使用有效。

definition: abbr. for 特別優惠|特别优惠[te4 bie2 you1 hui4]/ex gratia
buy one, get one free/two for the price of one
group buying/collective buying/buying by a group of individuals who negotiate a discount for the group
